ability_score.name: CON
ability_score.desc: How well one takes a hit, affects one's total hit points.

ability_score.name: STR
ability_score.desc: Ability to swing a weapon or move large objects, as well as general endurance.

ability_score.name: DEX
ability_score.desc: Ability to dodge, move quickly, and properly use some weapons.

ability_score.name: WIS
ability_score.desc: Ability to perceive and understand one's surroundings. Often used to resist spells. Used by some to cast spells.

ability_score.name: INT
ability_score.desc: Knowledge of the world, history, invention, and magic.

ability_score.name: CHA
ability_score.desc: Ability to handle people or other entities in a conversation. Used by some to cast spells.

class.long_desc: Fighters excel at combatâ€”defeating their enemies, controlling the flow of battle, and surviving such sorties themselves. While their specific weapons and methods grant them a wide variety of tactics, few can match fighters for sheer battle prowess.
class.name: Fighter
class.short_desc: Exceptional battle prowess and tactical skill.

class.long_desc: While some druids might keep to the fringe of battle, allowing companions and summoned creatures to fight while they confound foes with the powers of nature, others transform into deadly beasts and savagely wade into combat. Druids worship personifications of elemental forces, natural powers, or nature itself. Typically this means devotion to a nature deity, though druids are just as likely to revere vague spirits, animalistic demigods, or even specific awe-inspiring natural wonders.
class.name: Druid
class.short_desc: Manipulate flora and fauna to their advantage.

class.long_desc: While universalist wizards might study to prepare themselves for any manner of danger, specialist wizards research schools of magic that make them exceptionally skilled within a specific focus. Yet no matter their specialty, all wizards are masters of the impossible and can aid their allies in overcoming any danger.
class.name: Wizard
class.short_desc: Use their intelligence to control the universe.

racial_feats.desc: Select 1 additional skill rank per level.
racial_feats.name: Skilled

racial_feats.desc: Add +2 to your choice of ability score.
racial_feats.name: Human Versatility

racial_feats.desc: Immune to magic sleeps effects. Gain +2 to saving throws against enchantment spells and effects.
racial_feats.name: Elven Immunities

racial_feats.desc: +2 to overcome spell resistance. +2 to identify magic items.
racial_feats.name: Elven Magic

racial_feats.desc: Proficient with longbows, longswords, rapiers, and shortbows. Treat elven weapons as martial weapons.
racial_feats.name: Weapon Familiarity (Elven)

racial_feats.desc: See twice as far as humans in dim light.
racial_feats.name: Low-Light Vision

racial_feats.desc: +2 on saving throws against poison or spells.
racial_feats.name: Hardy

racial_feats.desc: +4 to resististing tripping or a bull rush.
racial_feats.name: Stability

racial_feats.desc: +2 to Appraise checks on nonmagical precious goods.
racial_feats.name: Greed

racial_feats.desc: +2 to Perception to notice unusual stonework, indicating traps or hidden doors. Recieve a check to notice such features when within 10 feet of them, even if not looking.
racial_feats.name: Stonecunning

racial_feats.desc: Can see perfectly in the dark up to 60 feet.
racial_feats.name: Darkvision

racial_feats.desc: +1 to attack rolls against orc or goblinoid creatures.
racial_feats.name: Hatred

racial_feats.desc: Proficient with battleaxes, heavy picks, and warhammers. Treat dwarven weapons as martial weapons.
racial_feats.name: Weapon Familiarity (Dwarven)

spell.name: Acid Arrow
spell.desc: An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack to hit your target. The arrow deals 2d4 points of acid damage with no splash damage. For every three caster levels you possess, the acid, unless neutralized, lasts for another round (to a maximum of 6 additional rounds at 18th level), dealing another 2d4 points of damage in each round.

spell.name: Acid Fog
spell.desc: Acid fog creates a billowing mass of misty vapors like the solid fog spell. In addition to slowing down creatures and obscuring sight, this spell's vapors are highly acidic. Each round on your turn, starting when you cast the spell, the fog deals 2d6 points of acid damage to each creature and object within it.

spell.name: Aid
spell.desc: Aid grants the target a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves against fear effects, plus temporary hit points equal to 1d8 + caster level (to a maximum of 1d8+10 temporary hit points at caster level 10th).

spell.name: Resistance
spell.desc: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
